title: Astronomy Connections:Strengthening Public and Schools Engagement around Hands-on Observing
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: Successful programme of public engagement was developed which sustains to the present. Education Cultural,Societal
findingsText: We learned how to construct a successful open day (and nights) for the public. We share our outreach products with those interested. Education
